name: Dillards Destiny
description:
Dillards Destiny is a game about a fly that is overthrowing the beetle king. The fly is named Dillard, and you are going to help him achieve his goal! This game was made for Wowie Jam 4.0 in roughly 3 days.

Volume can be adjusted via up/down arrow keys

Credits:

Made by Weldify

Boss battle music by Austism (alternatively austism.net), background music taken from the Wowie Jam resources.

Special thanks to evil_duck for helping playtest the game!
